com.octo.android.robospice.request.RequestListener

Packages that use RequestListener
com.octo.android.robospice This library provides aims to provide a robust framework for executing asynchronous network requests in android. 
com.octo.android.robospice.request

          Execute a request, put the result in cache with key requestCacheKey during cacheDuration millisecond and register listeners to notify when request is finished.
